text:
As climate change accelerates, where do we, as engineers, fit in? Are we part of the problem or part of the solution? @holly_cummins discusses some of the trade-offs and provides a roadmap to figuring out the right thing. #QConPlus 

#climatechange https://t.co/FDW6kOkjfk
